control_attributes.Control: CA-3 (2) CLASSIFIED NATIONAL SECURITY SYSTEM CONNECTIONS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization prohibits the direct connection of a classified, national security system to an external network without the use of [Assignment: organization-defined boundary protection device].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization reviews and updates the baseline configuration of the information system:
